name: FX Trades
notes: Book FX trades in the system
display_expr: str(selector_fx_trades)+' '+format_number(transactions[0].position_size_with_sign, decimal_pos=2, thousand_sep=' ', use_grouping=True)+' of '+transactions[0].transaction_currency.user_code+' vs '+transactions[0].settlement_currency.user_code+' '+transactions[0].instrument.user_code+' to '+transactions[0].portfolio.user_code
